name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_eq_max_lift
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Nonempty σ
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.lift.{u, v} (Cardinal.mk R)) (Cardinal.lift.{v, u} (Cardinal.mk σ))) Cardinal.aleph0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem cardinalMk_eq_max_lift [Nonempty σ] [Nontrivial R] :
    #(MvPolynomial σ R) = max (max (Cardinal.lift.{u} #R) <| Cardinal.lift.{v} #σ) ℵ₀ :=
  (mk_finsupp_lift_of_infinite _ R).trans <| by
    rw [mk_finsupp_nat, max_assoc, lift_max, lift_aleph0, max_comm]

name: MvPolynomial.cardinal_mk_eq_max_lift
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Nonempty σ
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.lift.{u, v} (Cardinal.mk R)) (Cardinal.lift.{v, u} (Cardinal.mk σ))) Cardinal.aleph0)

name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_eq_lift
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : IsEmpty σ
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Cardinal.lift.{u, v} (Cardinal.mk R))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem cardinalMk_eq_lift [IsEmpty σ] : #(MvPolynomial σ R) = Cardinal.lift.{u} #R :=
  ((isEmptyRingEquiv R σ).toEquiv.trans Equiv.ulift.{u}.symm).cardinal_eq

name: MvPolynomial.cardinal_mk_eq_lift
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : IsEmpty σ
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Cardinal.lift.{u, v} (Cardinal.mk R))

name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_eq_one
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : Subsingleton R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) 1
decl:
@[nontriviality]
theorem cardinalMk_eq_one [Subsingleton R] : #(MvPolynomial σ R) = 1 := mk_eq_one _

name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_le_max_lift
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
⊢ LE.le (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.lift.{u, v} (Cardinal.mk R)) (Cardinal.lift.{v, u} (Cardinal.mk σ))) Cardinal.aleph0)
decl:
theorem cardinalMk_le_max_lift {σ : Type u} {R : Type v} [CommSemiring R] : #(MvPolynomial σ R) ≤
    max (max (Cardinal.lift.{u} #R) <| Cardinal.lift.{v} #σ) ℵ₀ := by
  cases subsingleton_or_nontrivial R
  · exact (mk_eq_one _).trans_le (le_max_of_le_right one_le_aleph0)
  cases isEmpty_or_nonempty σ
  · exact cardinalMk_eq_lift.trans_le (le_max_of_le_left <| le_max_left _ _)
  · exact cardinalMk_eq_max_lift.le

name: MvPolynomial.cardinal_lift_mk_le_max
initialProofState:
σ : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
⊢ LE.le (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.lift.{u, v} (Cardinal.mk R)) (Cardinal.lift.{v, u} (Cardinal.mk σ))) Cardinal.aleph0)

name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_eq_max
initialProofState:
σ R : Type u
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Nonempty σ
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) (Cardinal.mk σ)) Cardinal.aleph0)
decl:
theorem cardinalMk_eq_max [Nonempty σ] [Nontrivial R] :
    #(MvPolynomial σ R) = max (max #R #σ) ℵ₀ := by simp

name: MvPolynomial.cardinal_mk_eq_max
initialProofState:
σ R : Type u
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Nonempty σ
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) (Cardinal.mk σ)) Cardinal.aleph0)

name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_eq
initialProofState:
σ R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : IsEmpty σ
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Cardinal.mk R)
decl: theorem cardinalMk_eq [IsEmpty σ] : #(MvPolynomial σ R) = #R := by simp

name: MvPolynomial.cardinalMk_le_max
initialProofState:
σ R : Type u
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
⊢ LE.le (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) (Cardinal.mk σ)) Cardinal.aleph0)
decl:
/-- The cardinality of the multivariate polynomial ring, `MvPolynomial σ R` is at most the maximum
of `#R`, `#σ` and `ℵ₀` -/
theorem cardinalMk_le_max : #(MvPolynomial σ R) ≤ max (max #R #σ) ℵ₀ :=
  cardinalMk_le_max_lift.trans <| by rw [lift_id, lift_id]

name: MvPolynomial.cardinal_mk_le_max
initialProofState:
σ R : Type u
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
⊢ LE.le (Cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial σ R)) (Max.max (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) (Cardinal.mk σ)) Cardinal.aleph0)
